contents.content: UNIT 02 面试话题 Interview Topics
Lesson 19 签订合同 Sign ng the Contract
杰克接到了面试通过的通知，去公司找人事部负责人约翰先生签订合同。

contents.title: 约翰：你好，杰克，我叫约翰。
contents.answer: John: Hello, Jack. I'm John.

contents.title: 杰克：见到您很高兴！
contents.answer: Jack: I'm glad to see you!

contents.title: 约翰：请坐。或许你已经看过合同了，但是在你签合同之前，我还是想就细节跟你谈谈。你必须有三个月的实习期。
contents.answer: John: Sit down, please. Maybe you have read the contract, but I want to give you the details again before you sign the contract. You must have a three-month internship.

contents.title: 杰克：是的，我知道。
contents.answer: Jack: Yes, I know.

contents.content: 签订劳动合同的注意事项
如果用人单位让求职者签订劳动合同，那么签合同之前，求职者一定要注意以下问题：首先，要仔细阅读合同的相关内容，一般合同上都会包括工作的具体内容，工作条件和对员工的工作要求等；另外，很多合同上也会注明公司的劳动报酬，社会保险和福利，劳动纪律等内容。

contents.title: 约翰：在你成为正式员工之后会有保险。你的工资是月付的，八小时工作制。
contents.answer: John: When you become a permanent employee, you will have the insurances. You will get monthly pay and will be on eight-hour/day work shift.

contents.title: 杰克：稍等，有五险一金吗？
contents.answer: Jack: Wait, will I have fi ve insurances and one fund?

contents.title: 约翰：有。你还能享受法定节假日和年终奖金。
contents.answer: John: Yes. You can also enjoy legal holidays and year-end bonus.

contents.title: 杰克：听起来真是太棒了！
contents.answer: Jack: It sounds great!

contents.title: 约翰：如果需要加班，加班费是双倍工资。
contents.answer: John: If you need to work overtime, you will get twice the usual salary as overtime pay.

contents.title: 杰克：好的。
contents.answer: Jack: OK.

contents.content: 在看劳动合同时，要注意合同上所列举的内容跟公司口头所承诺的有没有出入，如果没有的话，要马上向公司提出疑问。一般的劳动合同上，都会注明劳动合同期限，即这个合同的有效期。如果在此期间出了什么问题，劳动者可以根据合同来保障自己的合法权益。

contents.title: 约翰：你已经看了合同的相关条款，还有其他问题吗？
contents.answer: John: You have read the relevant terms of the contract. Do you have other questions?

contents.title: 杰克：入职培训需要多长时间呢？
contents.answer: Jack: How long will the induction training be?

contents.title: 约翰：大约两周。
contents.answer: John: About two weeks.

contents.title: 杰克：我明白了。
contents.answer: Jack: I see.

contents.title: 约翰：如果你没有其他问题了，请在这儿签字。
contents.answer: John: If you don't have other questions, just sign here.

contents.title: 杰克：好的。
contents.answer: Jack: OK.

contents.content: 一般情况下，用人单位都会让劳动者签订书面合同，合同一式两份，用人单位和劳动者都各自保存一份，这些都要注意。

contents.title: 1.你通过面试后就可以和公司签订劳动合同。
contents.answer: You can sign the labor contract with the company after you pass the interview.

contents.title: 2.员工进入公司后，就应该立即签订合同。
contents.answer: Contracts should be signed immediately when an employee joins the company.

contents.title: 3.试用期包含在劳动合同内。
contents.answer: The probation period is included in the labor contract.

contents.title: 4.从现在开始的前三个月是你的试用期。
contents.answer: The first three months from now on is your probation period.

contents.title: 5.试用期最长不得超过一年。
contents.answer: The probation period should not be longer than one year.

contents.title: 6.前两年你能拿到两个月的年终奖金。
contents.answer: You can get a two-month year-end bonus for the first two years.

contents.title: 7.公司有年终奖金吗？
contents.answer: Is there a year-end bonus in the company?

contents.title: 8.在我们公司，所有劳动者都享有法定节假日。
contents.answer: All workers are entitled to enjoy legal holidays in our company.

contents.title: 9.一般来说，公司必须支付加班费。
contents.answer: Generally speaking, the company must pay for overtime work.

contents.title: 10.你过了试用期才能拿奖金。
contents.answer: You can get bonus only after you pass your probation period.
